original_solution_mapping.L1: The number of apples remaining after Jack gave his father 10 is 55 - 10 = <<55-10=45>>45.
original_solution_mapping.L2: The share each one of his friends including him will get is 45 / 5 = <<45/5=9>>9.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2654.
    Returns: the number of apples each person will get.
    """
    # L1
    total_apples = 55 # Jack bought 55 apples
    apples_for_father = 10 # give 10 to his father
    remaining_apples = total_apples - apples_for_father

    # L2
    number_of_people_sharing = 5 # him and his 4 friends
    apples_per_person = remaining_apples / number_of_people_sharing

    # FA
    answer = apples_per_person
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The number of apples remaining after Jack gave his father {apples_for_father} is {total_apples} - {apples_for_father} = <<{total_apples}-{apples_for_father}={remaining_apples}>>{remaining_apples}.
The share each one of his friends including him will get is {remaining_apples} / {number_of_people_sharing} = <<{remaining_apples}/{number_of_people_sharing}={apples_per_person}>>{apples_per_person}.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The number of apples remaining after Jack gave his father 10 is 55 - 10 = <<55-10=65>>65.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: The share each one of his friends including him will get is 65 / 5 = <<65/5=13>>13.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.
